title.rendered: Alticor Inc Releases COMMIT Safety Promotional Video

content.rendered:
When it comes to safety at Alticor Inc, we look out for one another and everyone around us — clients, partners, family, and friends. We all benefit from our SAFE network. It’s our most critical job and gives rise to our philosophy: “No job is so important it cannot be performed the safe way.”

COMMIT represents our ongoing dedication to safety. Sending our people home to their families is the most important thing we do — it’s The Alticor Inc Way. By implementing SAFE principles, we COMMIT to saving lives and preventing injuries.

Our safety program is successful because we incorporate safety into every operation through leadership involvement, employee engagement, and accountability.

Are YOU in? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pbwzJKNpS98
